New Records: Nicholas Pooran has hit the most sixes in T20 cricket in 2024 - 77 - and he is fifth on the list for most runs in T20 cricket this year - 993
Andre Russell's strike rate of 207.89 in T20 cricket this year is the highest for any batter who has faced more than 75 balls
Obed McCoy has picked up 36 wickets in T20 cricket this year, the fourth-highest
Key Match Events: West Indies won by 5 wickets (with 6 balls remaining)
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies look to make early moves and return to their glory days
PNG might not appear as threatening as some of the other teams, but West Indies will have to start strong
Nicholas Pooran is coming into the tournament in fine six-hitting form
Charles Amini, PNG's primary spinner, is also a handy batter, and his all-round abilities will hold the key to his team's fortunes
Post-Match Reflections: West Indies captain Rovman Powell expects big things from Andre Russell
PNG captain Assad Vala says his team isn't here just to make up the numbers
Miscellaneous Highlights: A host nation has never won the men's T20 World Cup, and West Indies will hope to buck the trend this time
The average first-innings score at Providence in T20 games since the start of 2022 is 168 with teams happier to bat second
There are chances of showers and even a thunderstorm early in the day
